resources.string:
Oh, recruit! Your found us here too… 
I'm Riven, just in case you don't remember. 
Anyway, some of us, from the spiritual world, wanted to share with more people our purposes and interests, so we asked to create an app. 
Hope you like it.
This is Yasuo\'s presentation. He\'s good.
What is this?! Who did this stupid thing?!
You can\'t stop something that isn\'t playing.
That\'s… a good sign I suppose?
Oh look at that! You\'re a lucky one, indeed.
Darling, you need to fill the names so I can give you a result, yes?
